SEARCH
Package GameEngine

Interface IInputListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameEngine, GameManager, InputSnakeController
public interface IInputListener
Represents a game object that listens for input Also acts as a wrapper interface for KeyListener
See Also:
  • GameObject
  • CollisionManager

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onInputReceived(String input)
    Event called when input is received from stdin.
    void
    onKeyPressed(KeyEvent event)
    Event called when a key is pressed Should only be called by the InputManager
    void
    onKeyReleased(KeyEvent event)
    Event called when a key is released Should only be called by the InputManager
    void
    onKeyTyped(KeyEvent event)
    Event called when a key is typed Should only be called by the InputManager

  • Method Details

    • onInputReceived

      void onInputReceived(String input)
      Event called when input is received from stdin. Should only be called by the GameEngine
      Parameters:
      input - the input received

    • onKeyPressed

      void onKeyPressed(KeyEvent event)
      Event called when a key is pressed Should only be called by the InputManager
      Parameters:
      event - information in regards to the key pressed.

    • onKeyReleased

      void onKeyReleased(KeyEvent event)
      Event called when a key is released Should only be called by the InputManager
      Parameters:
      event - information in regards to the key released.

    • onKeyTyped

      void onKeyTyped(KeyEvent event)
      Event called when a key is typed Should only be called by the InputManager
      Parameters:
      event - information in regards to the key typed.
